name: swe-arena-4
description: Competitive results website with Next.js frontend and Django backend

scripts.setup: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && . venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt && python manage.py migrate && python manage.py seed_data && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.backend-start: cd backend && . venv/bin/activate && python manage.py runserver 8000
